if we will need the eemeli/yaml YAML library we can:
    extract the code from the NPM package with the command:
        npx pacote extract yaml@2.8.1 vendor/yaml
    copy here the folder /browser from the extracted yaml package

npm
https://www.npmjs.com/package/yaml

github
https://github.com/eemeli/yaml
backup repository
https://github.com/77it/yaml_eemeli
